籤詩版本二:
Nkovuta kwambiri kuyesetsa kuchita bwino, koma masiku omenyera ukwati ndi otanganidwa kwakanthaŵi.
+ Pamapeto pake adzalasidwa ndi muvi, + ndipo munthu wolemekezeka amatsogolera anthu olemekezeka.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi imayimira dalitso pobisala.
Zonse ndi zabwino.
解曰: Kusintha mwadala. Enron pomaliza. Mukafunsa za kugwiritsa ntchito. Pafupi ndi anthu olemekezeka okha.
籤詩故事一:
◇Upangiri wamabuku Jiang Wei (Mabuku omwe anganene Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), dzina laulemu Boyue, anali mbadwa ya Ji County, Tianshui County, Liangzhou (tsopano Gangu County, Tianshui City, Gansu Province).
Panthawi ya Mafumu Atatu, Kong Ming adatsogolera asilikali ake kuchokera ku Phiri la Qishan maulendo asanu ndi limodzi kukamenyana ndi Cao Wei. Anaphunzitsa machaputala makumi awiri ndi anayi a Bukhu la Nkhondo kwa Jiang Wei wamkulu, akuyembekeza kuti adzalandira cholowa chake.
(Fanizo la nkhaniyi ndikuti Jiang Wei adatengera zifukwa zina)
聖意: Nyumbayo ili bwino, ndikuyenda bwino, ndikufuna chuma, ndikukwatiwa, woyenda mwamuna kulibe, mbozi ya silika ili ku Zhongping, nyama zisanu ndi imodzi zili ku Zhongping, ndikufuna wina, mlandu uyenera. , Ndisamuka, Ndine wolemera, Ndine wolemera, Ndikudwala matenda a Kum'maŵa, Ndachita mwayi m'manda a Xingxing Mountain.
古人: Malangizo a Buku kwa Jiang Wei (Mabuku kupita ku Jiang Wei)
